segments.text: I see a home brimming with life, yet on the verge of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water rolling off the cabinet doors is mesmerizing, but so wrong at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel for the woman; she’s so engrossed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s determination to reach that cookie jar is both admirable and foolish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl’s anticipation; she really believes she’s about to receive a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s exhilarating to watch them, but part of me shudders at the risk they’re taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What will happen if that stool tips over?
segments.speaker: PAR
